title: Vibrant Vector
description: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne utilisant des couleurs unies audacieuses et des formes géométriques épurées. Présente un ombrage minimal à bords nets sans contours, typique de l'art d'entreprise et éditorial haut de gamme.
prompt: A premium flat vector illustration of {{subject}}, executed in a modern corporate art style commonly seen in high-end tech branding and editorial design. The artwork relies entirely on bold geometric shapes, clean curves, and solid color fills, completely eschewing gradients, textures, brushstrokes, or noise for a pristine digital look. The rendering technique mimics vector graphics software like Adobe Illustrator, focusing on razor-sharp edges and simplified, stylized forms. The color palette is vibrant, punchy, and saturated, utilizing {{primary_color}} as the dominant tone for the main structural elements, vividly contrasted by energetic pops of {{accent_color}} to highlight key details, patterns, and accessories. Lighting is purely stylistic and flat, where shadows are rendered not as soft gradients but as distinct, hard-edged geometric shapes in a slightly darker shade, creating a crisp sense of depth without breaking the 2D aesthetic. The composition is balanced and graphic, with a focus on visual clarity and shape hierarchy. The mood is optimistic, professional, approachable, and dynamic. The final image is composited on a clean, solid {{background_color}} surface, ensuring distinct separation between the subject and the negative space for perfect contrast. No outlines, lineless art style, flat design, vector aesthetics, trending on Dribbble, Behance, 8k resolution, crisp details, minimalist shading, high contrast, vivid colors, commercial art.
description_en: A modern flat vector illustration style utilizing bold solid colors and clean geometric shapes. Features minimal hard-edged shading and crisp lines without outlines, typical of high-end corporate and editorial art.
description_fr: Un style d'illustration vectorielle moderne utilisant des couleurs unies audacieuses et des formes géométriques épurées. Présente un ombrage minimal à bords nets sans contours, typique de l'art d'entreprise et éditorial haut de gamme.
background_prompt: A flat vector background pattern featuring abstract geometric shapes, floating circles, and angular blocks in a modern corporate art style. The composition uses solid fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} with hard-edged shadows and no gradients. Clean, minimalist, and decorative design elements arranged on a solid {{background_color}} surface.
